meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Discussion of the resignation of City Manager
agenda_items.description: Discussion of the resignation of City Manager, T.C. Broadnax, and a resolution appointing Kimberly Tolbert as Interim City Manager for the City of Dallas, effective at the close of business on June 3, 2024, to serve until the City Council selects and appoints the city manager.

agenda_items.title: Consideration and discussion regarding the search process for city manager
agenda_items.description: Consideration and discussion regarding the search process for and hiring of a candidate for the position of city manager.

agenda_items.title: Discussion regarding performance evaluations
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding process and schedule for performance evaluations for City Attorney, Tammy L. Palomino, City Secretary, Bilierae Johnson, and City Auditor, Mark Swann.
